original_title: Falcon Four Hours: Wild West Cowboys
overview: Forty Hot and Horny Men. Thirteen Scenes. Two Discs. Four Hot Hours of Cowboys, Cowpokes and Ranch Hands Getting Down and Dirty in One Sizzling Collection. Lean back in the saddle and enjoy the erotic exploits of these rough and ready studs who know how to make the best of a hard ride in the wild west! It's a smoldering stampede of sexual prowess branded with the mark of the Men of Falcon!. Tip your hat to these hearty studs whose unbridled energy makes for a good mount and a hot lather!.
title: Falcon Four Hours: Wild West Cowboys
